weekly_top_story.headline: Brazil’s Supreme Court sentences former President Jair Bolsonaro to 27 years in prison
weekly_top_story.summary: Brazil's highest court has sentenced former President Jair Bolsonaro to over 27 years in prison, marking a significant legal and political development with broad implications for regional stability and democratic accountability.

stories.headline: Canada and Mexico agree to deepen strategic partnership
stories.summary: Canada and Mexico have announced plans to enhance their strategic partnership, focusing on economic cooperation and regional stability, which could reshape North American trade dynamics.

stories.headline: National Guard to deploy in Memphis amid ongoing crime concerns
stories.summary: President Trump has ordered the deployment of National Guard troops to Memphis to address crime issues, despite the city's crime rate reportedly declining, highlighting tensions in urban security policies.
